entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 except 60 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
